title: A Million Suns
description: Book 2 in the  New York Times  bestselling trilogy, perfect for fans of Battlestar Gallactica and  Prometheus !GODSPEED WAS FUELED BY LIES. NOW IT IS RULED BY CHAOS.It's been three months since Amy was unplugged. The life she always knew is over. Everywhere she looks, she sees the walls of the spaceship  Godspeed . But there may just be Elder has assumed leadership of the ship. He's finally free to act on his vision--no more Phydus, no more lies. But when Elder learns shocking news, he and Amy must race to discover the truth behind life on  Godspeed , all the while dealing with the love that's growing between them and the chaos that threatens to tear them apart.Beth Revis catapulted readers into the far reaches of space with her  New York Times  bestselling debut,  Across the Universe . In  A Million Suns,  Beth deepens the mystery with action, suspense, romance, and deep philosophical questions. And this time it all builds to one mind-bending THEY HAVE TO GET OFF THIS SHIP.
author: Beth Revis
